projects.title: CoSchedule.com - Clone
projects.description: CoSchedule is a website that helps marketers get organized. CoSchedule completely transformed the way marketers plan, execute, and manage their marketing projects

projects.title: Language Translator App
projects.description: This project is about building a web app for language translation using language translator API. Here you will be able to translate between languages very easily

projects.title: Geekbuying.com - Clone
projects.description: The project deals with developing an e-commerce website for electronics care products. An online store where customers can select products of interest. The selected items collected in a shopping cart. For checkout, customer will be asked to fill address and payment information. Email is sent to the customer for OTP verification and for successful payment/order placed.

projects.title: YouTube.com - Clone
projects.description: A simple YouTube clone completed in two days , where user can find all the videos similar as YouTube app . where user can search for the video & download the videos .

projects.title: mamaEarth.com - Clone
projects.description: The project deals with developing an e-commerce website for skin products. An online store where customers can select products of interest. The selected items collected in a shopping cart. For checkout, customer will be asked to fill address and payment information. Email is sent to the customer for OTP verification and for successful payment/order placed.
